heroOptions.headline: Empowering You to Live Well

heroOptions.subline: Discover workouts and nutrition programs designed for real, lasting results.

items.title: Exercise Program
items.excerpt: Strong body, stronger mind - train daily, shine daily. Consistency builds strength, and strength builds confidence.

items.title: Nutrition Plans
items.excerpt: Fuel your body with the right food, and it will reward you with energy and strength. Good nutrition isn't a diet, it's a lifestyle for lifelong health.

items.title: Diet Program
items.excerpt: A healthy diet is not about restriction, it's about nourishment - eat better, live better. Small changes in your plate create big changes in your life.

items.title: Muscle Training
items.excerpt: Muscles are built with sweat, strength, and consistency.

items.title: Yoga
items.excerpt: Find strength, stillness and self-awareness on the mat.

items.title: Jogging
items.excerpt: Consistency over speed. Every step makes you stronger.

items.title: Mindfulness
items.excerpt: Balance your body, calm your mind, nourish your soul.

items.title: Self Care
items.excerpt: Invest in yourself today to avoid illness tomorrow.

items.title: Mental Health
items.excerpt: Healing begins when you choose to speak and seek support.

items.title: Rainbow Lentil & Brown Rice Veggie Bowls
instructions: Slice cucumbers and tomatoes; slice olives and chop spring onions; cook corn.
Layer bowls: lentils, veggies, corn, rice. Garnish with herbs.
Season with salt, pepper, olive oil, and lemon juice.

items.title: Salmon Stir-Fry with Broccoli & Bell Peppers
instructions: Season salmon with salt, pepper, lemon.
Stir-fry broccoli and peppers until tender-crisp; remove.
Return vegetables; add garlic, soy, chili; toss and serve with green onions.
optional: Add mushrooms, snap peas, or carrots.
Replace salmon with tofu or chicken.

items.title: Rainbow Buddha Bowl
ingredients: 1 cup cooked brown rice or quinoa
instructions: Roast sweet potatoes at 200°C (400°F) for 20–25 minutes.
Assemble bowls and drizzle dressing; sprinkle sesame seeds.

privacy.question: 1. Information We Collect
answers: Email Address: We collect your email address when you voluntarily subscribe to our newsletters, health tips, or updates.
Optional Information: If you contact us directly (e.g., via forms), we may collect your name or other details you provide.
Non-Personal Information: Like most websites, we may collect basic browsing data (IP, browser type, pages visited) for analytics and improvement.

privacy.question: 2. How We Use Your Information
answers: Send health-related tips, resources, and updates.
Share newsletters or content you subscribed to.
Respond to your inquiries or feedback.

privacy.question: 3. Email Marketing & Unsubscribing
answers: You will only receive emails if you opt-in.
Every email we send includes an unsubscribe link so you can stop receiving messages anytime.
We do not send spam or irrelevant promotions.

privacy.question: 4. Data Sharing
answers: We do not sell, rent, or share your personal information with third parties for commercial purposes.
If we use a third-party email service (like Mailchimp, Brevo, etc.), your email address is stored securely within that platform and used only to send you the messages you subscribed to.
Data may be disclosed only if required by law.

privacy.question: 5. Cookies & Tracking
answers: We may use cookies or analytics tools to understand how our website is used and improve user experience.
These tools collect anonymous statistics, not personal details.

privacy.question: 6. Data Security
answers: We take reasonable precautions to protect your personal information.
However, no system is 100% secure, so please use the website at your own discretion.

privacy.question: 7. Children’s Privacy
answers: Our email services are not directed toward children under 13, and we do not knowingly collect their information.

privacy.question: 8. Changes to This Privacy Policy
answers: We may update this Privacy Policy occasionally.
Updates will be posted here with a revised date.

privacy.question: 9. Contact Us
answers: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or your data, please contact us at: contact@yespublic.net
